item.title: 本周金价再创新高。但是，纽蒙特和巴里克等最大的矿商却没有取得同样的成功。原因如下
item.description:
The gold price this week hit another record high. But the biggest miners, such as Newmont and Barrick, haven’t enjoyed the same success. Here's why https://t.co/lCzbKedyus pic.twitter.com/gQdW2Ws4vW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 实时新闻更新：因长期财务目标延迟，Foot Locker 股价暴跌

item.title: 在英国财政大臣的演讲中，削减国民保险缴款、改革 "非家庭 "纳税地位和英国Isa是主要内容。
item.description:
A cut in national insurance contributions, reform of the ‘non-dom’ tax status and a British Isa dominated the UK chancellor’s speech.

But what does the Budget mean for your money? https://t.co/K06SETbSYL pic.twitter.com/6qhj8KHrk5

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）声称英国经济已经 "转危为安"，他在大选前的预算案中提出了 100 亿英镑的个人减税计划，这也是保守党力图推翻工党在民调中的领先地位并继续执政的核心所在。
item.description:
UK chancellor Jeremy Hunt claimed that Britain’s economy has 'turned the corner', as his pre-election Budget put a £10bn personal tax cut at the heart of the Conservatives’ bid to overturn Labour’s polling lead and hold on to power https://t.co/RNxNpJsSG4 pic.twitter.com/drzY5wZ41e

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 预算案对您的资金意味着什么

What the Budget means for your money https://t.co/SYCXLLB0lV

item.title: 杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）在大选前的预算中宣布削减国民保险100亿英镑
item.description:
Jeremy Hunt unveils £10bn national insurance cut in pre-election Budget https://t.co/P36voV65SM

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 杰伊-鲍威尔将告诉立法者实现通胀目标的进展没有 "保证
item.description:
Jay Powell to tell lawmakers progress on hitting inflation goal not ‘assured’ https://t.co/zpPMchImb3

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 取消非本国人税制，预计每年将产生 27 亿英镑的收入。
item.description:
The non-dom tax regime is to be abolished and expected to generate £2.7bn a year.

🔹The abolition of the current tax system for non-doms.
🔹A new system for new arrivals in the UK
🔹No tax for first four years of residence, the same tax as residentshttps://t.co/AhxlumCEDy

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在这份预算案中，与未来的运行体系相比，财政大臣降低了税收。因此，税负会增加，但不会像财政大臣今天站起来之前预计的那么快，@ChrisGiles_写道。
item.description:
In this Budget, the chancellor is lowering taxes compared with the system that was due to operate in future. So, the tax burden is going up, but not as fast as was expected before the chancellor stood up today, writes @ChrisGiles_https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）公布了一系列税收改革措施，其中包括征收吸烟税和提高烟草税。
item.description:
A vaping tax and an increase in tobacco duty are part of a slew of tax reforms have unveiled by UK chancellor Jeremy Hunt https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 能源利润税延长至 2029 年，非注册地税制消失。工党的大部分税收政策都在这里得到了应用：
item.description:
Energy profits levy extended to 2029, non-domiciled tax regime gone. Most of Labour's revenue raisers being used here: https://t.co/ZXSlnS0mTv

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) March 6, 2024

item.title: 杰里米-亨特承诺投资绿色能源，其中包括：🔹两座新核电站🔹环境、社会和治理监管🔹为绿色产业提供 1.2 亿英镑的额外资金。
item.description:
Jeremy Hunt has pledged investment in green energy including:

🔹Two new nuclear plants
🔹Regulation for environmental, social and governance
🔹£120mn additional funding to the green industries

Follow our live coverage of the Budget https://t.co/hQ6IjvGITd

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: "罗伯茨承诺，他将 "判球和好球，不投球也不击球"。实际上，他的法庭既是球员又是裁判。法院近期判决的唯一共同点就是它们都是为特朗普服务的。"我谈美国法院的暴政。
item.description:
"Roberts pledged that he would “call balls and strikes and not to pitch or bat”. In practice his court is both player and umpire. The only common ground between the court's recent decisions is that they serve Trump." Me on the tyranny of America's court. https://t.co/sOxV57Jv8L

— Edward Luce (@EdwardGLuce) March 6, 2024

item.title: 杰里米-亨特宣布，政府将对评估公司 ESG（环境、社会和治理）绩效的机构进行监管。
item.description:
Jeremy Hunt has announced the govt will regulate the agencies that evaluate the ESG (environmental, social & governance) performance of companies

Confirms the @FT scoop from me and @KenzaBryan late last yearhttps://t.co/ETxEakLycJ

— Lucy Fisher (@LOS_Fisher) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国最高法院的暴政
item.description:
The tyranny of America’s Supreme Court https://t.co/9gXV2Ntb5c

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 意见：英国最新预算对您的家庭有何影响？ 预算责任办公室上调了2024年和2025年的经济增长预测。杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）声称这是功劳，但几乎可以肯定的是，由于能源价格降低，英国家庭...
item.description:
Opinion: What impact will the UK's latest budget have on your household? The Office for Budget Responsibility has nudged up the growth forecast in 2024 and 2025.

Jeremy Hunt claimed credit, but it is almost certainly the result of lower energy prices that allows UK household… pic.twitter.com/fJ71XmRiuK

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 不出所料，燃油税被冻结，5 便士的 "临时 "削减在实施两年后依然存在。更多详情及 #Budget2024 的滚动更新，请访问《金融时报》现场直播：
item.description:
As expected, fuel duty frozen & the "temporary" 5p cut remains, two years after it was brought in.

More details & rolling #Budget2024 updates on FT liveblog: https://t.co/cVca17oamL pic.twitter.com/aohJJZ9oIc

— Peter Campbell (@Petercampbell1) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）表示，英国的通货膨胀率将在 "几个月后 "降至 2% 的目标值以下，比之前的预测提前近一年。
item.description:
Inflation in the UK will fall below 2% target in 'a few months' time', nearly a year earlier than previously forecast, says UK chancellor Jeremy Hunthttps://t.co/hQ6IjvGITd

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 西班牙阻止萨姆-奥特曼的眼球扫描风险投资公司 Worldcoin
item.description:
Spain blocks Sam Altman’s eyeball-scanning venture Worldcoin https://t.co/THiU9YX0QC

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）宣布将新的预算预支贷款的还款期从 12 个月延长至 24 个月。
item.description:
UK chancellor Jeremy Hunt has announced an extension in the repayment period for new budgeting advance loans from 12 months to 24 months.

He said the measure was designed to help people 'falling into debt'https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy pic.twitter.com/mVgfpG8Ojm

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 欧盟削弱供应链法以安抚德国和意大利
item.description:
EU waters down supply chain law to placate Germany and Italy https://t.co/KbYMFJmGzW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 由于今年晚些时候将举行大选，今天的英国预算值得关注。点击此处关注我们的现场报道
item.description:
With an election due later this year, today's UK Budget is one to watch. Follow our live coverage here https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 秘密的非特朗普选民 "之谜--来自 @SpiegelPeter 的专栏。这位美国前总统在 "超级星期二 "的表现仍然低于民调机构的预测
item.description:
The mystery of the ‘secret non-Trump voter’ - column from @SpiegelPeter. The former US president continued to underperform the pollsters’ predictions on Super Tuesday https://t.co/K8YH888fiw pic.twitter.com/wyxSXCrF5u

— Tony Tassell (@TonyTassell) March 6, 2024
